articles.author: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai
articles.title: Apple fixes iPhone and iPad bug used in an "extremely sophisticated attack" - TechCrunch
articles.description: Unknown attackers may have exploited a zero-day bug to access data on locked phones, according to Apple.
articles.content: On Monday, Apple released updates for its mobile operating systems for iOS and iPadOS, which fixed a flaw that the company said may have been exploited in an extremely sophisticated attack against sp… [+2312 chars]
